-   In the rice space there are only a handful of competitors all competing over a relatively few acres (compared to soybean, maize).

<!-- -->

-   The projects are fairly straightforward. Pay farmers to implement some AWD, verify with imagery that fields did indeed dry down, and make claims on the prevented/avoided emissions.

-   The CEO of AgriCapture, Tyler Hull, posts commentary on how he sees the space evolving.

-   CAR might have some documents about rice and projects
